page.title: 02A Day in My Life
page.content: By Huw Thomas Age 11 May 18th 1985 At 7.30a.m. I get up and prepare the breakfast table and I eat my breakfast of cereal and water. I wake my mother at 8.10a.m. and then I practise my clarinet or piano. I walk to school with my friend Elis .School starts at 9.00a.m. First we have assembly where we have a religious story.From 9.20a.m. to 10.30a.m. we have mathematics.From 10.30a.m. to 10.45a.m. we have playtime when we play soccer. Then we have Welsh until 12.10p.m. We have our lunch and then playtime until 1.15p.m.We have English until 2.20p.m. and we break until 2.35p.m.We go home at 3.30.p.m. we have art, games or music during the last session. I have my tea at 6.00p.m. and after I have played I watch television.
